## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install 8bit_adder in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure 8bit_adder package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to 8bit_adder
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/mone27/8bit-adder):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/mone27/8bit-adder.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/mone27/8bit-adder)

``` sh
$ conda install -c mone27 8bit_adder
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/8bit-adder/)

``` sh
$ pip install 8bit_adder
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/mone27/8bit-adder)’s
[pages](https://mone27.github.io/8bit-adder/). Additionally you can find
package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/mone27/8bit-adder) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/8bit-adder/) respectively.
